game.name: VRChat
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Sports, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Tracked Controller Support, VR Supported, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Join our growing community as you explore, play, and help craft the future of social VR. Create worlds and custom avatars. Welcome to VRChat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join our growing community as you explore, play, and help craft the future of social VR. Create worlds and custom avatars. Welcome to VRChat.

reviewHighlights.text: hey, so, definitely cancelling my vrc+ and i hope others do as well. putting items behind a paywall and making them CONSUMABLE is exactly what so many...
The game is basically a hivemind of predators looking for kids, this is the game equivelant of the Epstein Island but 100x worse
